projects.title: Machine Learning Onboarding Project
description: Introduces PyTorch, a Python-based machine-learning framework
Teaches foundations of how machine learning functions
Helps members create a classification machine learning model
Leaves members with trained neural networks and resources for training more complex models

projects.title: CAD Onboarding Project
description: Guides members through the 3D design process
Teaches beginner and intermediate tools and assemblies as well as CAD best practices
Leaves members with printable CAD models and resources for designing more complex models

projects.title: Electronics Onboarding Project
description: Guides members through bandpass filter circuit simulation using LTSpice
Demonstrates how to design and construct a PCB using KiCad
Leaves members with a basic understanding of electronics design and simulation
